## Properties

| Property            | Attribute | Description                       | Type      | Default     |
| ------------------- | --------- | --------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `loading`           | `loading` | Indicates the loading state.      | `boolean` | `true`      |
| `text` _(required)_ | `text`    | The label of the loading spinner. | `string`  | `undefined` |
